name: Portfolio Intelligence
description: Attention-prioritized portfolio dashboard combining 6 reporting signals (update cadence, meeting cadence, projection tracking, budget stability, data room freshness, responsiveness) with thesis alignment scoring into a Linear triage-inspired attention queue. Signal feed as right sidebar.
prompt: /prototype Portfolio Intelligence View — attention-prioritized portfolio dashboard combining reporting signals with thesis alignment into a Linear triage-inspired attention queue

versions.notes: V1: Three-tab architecture with underline tabs. Attention Queue, Health Grid, Signal Feed as separate views.

V2: Revised layout — no tabs. Single-view: Attention Queue (left) + Signal Feed sidebar (right). Added meeting cadence as 6th signal with dual segment bars (updates + meetings). Thesis Alignment kept as separate nav item. List/grid toggle in header (Linear-style). Snooze dropdown with options. Meeting events in signal feed.

V3: Typography fix (title case headers, no uppercase). Functional health scatter plot via list/grid toggle — companies positioned spatially by reporting health (Y) vs thesis alignment (X) with dot-grid background, crosshair dividers, quadrant labels, status-colored avatar borders, hover tooltips. Border removal throughout. Signal feed on white background. Card hover pattern corrected (border-transparent + hover:border-subtle + shadow-sm + translate-y).
